name: FRACTURED GEMS
description:
"Don't you just hate it when you're just trying to find love, but then you end up getting arrested for murder instead?"

The discovery of a woman's corpse on one fateful night raises a variety of questions. Questions that lead to even stranger secrets. 

Kenny Kaluha, a seemingly ordinary woman, unfortunate in her love-life (and just life in general), somehow always finds herself in the middle of these strange events. 

Uncover the mysteries and arrive at the truth that lies at the center of this bizarre tale of love and death in Fractured Gems.

CURRENT FEATURES

Fractured Gems is currently in alpha, but here's what you can get out of it right now:

  • An exciting, short introduction to the larger story.
  • Humorous dialogue and banter.
  • Three unique endings.
  • Unlimited breadsticks (Currently unavailable)
FUTURE FEATURES

Here's what you can expect in the full release!

  • A weird and unconventional story, with a cast of even weirder and more unconventional characters.
  • Seven unique endings.
  • Even more amazing artwork and music. 
  • That warm feeling of putting on a new pair of socks on a cold winter morning.
CREDITS Character Art

Sprite asset pack by Sutemo
